name: Opera Portal Beta: More legible version
description:
More legible version of Opera Portal Beta. http://portal.opera.com
Changed title font size to 16 px and content font size to 14px
Changed line-height
Removed beta tag
Changed background to light gray.
Added hover highlight
You can still apply the different color schemes.

update:
Removed changes to the line height of the header, now news display properly.
Bigger font size not longer applied to the footer.
